name: AegisOps
description: We build AI-powered cybersecurity platforms that help government agencies detect and respond to threats in real-time. Our SOC automation reduces incident response time by 80%.

name: CloudBridge
description: We provide secure cloud migration and disaster recovery tooling tailored for public sector IT teams.

name: CivicSight
description: We create executive dashboards that unify data from multiple departments with governance, lineage, and audit trails.

name: PermitFlow AI
description: We automate permitting intake using document AI to extract fields, flag missing info, and reduce review time by 50%.

name: TransitPulse
description: We optimize public transit routing with ML to reduce delays and improve on-time performance.

name: HealthQueue
description: We modernize clinic scheduling with SMS reminders, intake triage, and no-show reduction analytics.

name: PotholeVision
description: We use computer vision to detect roadway defects and prioritize maintenance work orders.

name: OpenDataHub
description: We deliver open data portals with fast search, public APIs, and dataset quality scoring.

name: FloodCast
description: We provide AI-powered flood forecasting and resource allocation tools for emergency management.

name: SecureEndpoint
description: We manage endpoint protection and device compliance at scale with automated patching and EDR integration.
